holes.original_proof:
classical
have h₂ : k ≤ n := hk
have h₃ : k ≤ n := hk
have h₄ : n ≥ k := by linarith
have h₅ : ∃ (V : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)), Module.rank ℝ V = k ∧ (Z ∩ V).ncard = 2 ^ k :=
  by
  by_cases hk0 : k = 0
  · use ⊥
    have h₆ : Module.rank ℝ (⊥ : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)) = 0 := by simp
    have h₇ : (Z ∩ (⊥ : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)) : Set (Fin n → ℝ)) = {(0 : Fin n → ℝ)} :=
      by
      rw [Set.ext_iff]
      intro x
      simp only [Set.mem_inter_iff, Set.mem_singleton_iff, Submodule.mem_bot]
      constructor
      · intro h
        have h₈ : x ∈ Z := h.1
        have h₉ : (x : Fin n → ℝ) = 0 := by simpa [Submodule.mem_bot] using h.2
        rw [hZ] at h₈
        have h₁₀ : ∀ j : Fin n, (x : Fin n → ℝ) j = 0 ∨ (x : Fin n → ℝ) j = 1 := h₈
        have h₁₁ : (x : Fin n → ℝ) = 0 := by simpa [Submodule.mem_bot] using h.2
        simp_all [Function.funext_iff] <;> aesop
      · intro h
        have h₈ : (x : Fin n → ℝ) = 0 := by simpa [Submodule.mem_bot] using h
        rw [hZ]
        constructor
        · intro j
          have h₉ : (x : Fin n → ℝ) j = 0 := by simp [h₈]
          simp_all [Submodule.mem_bot] <;> aesop
        · simp_all [Submodule.mem_bot] <;> aesop
    have h₈ : (Z ∩ (⊥ : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)) : Set (Fin n → ℝ)) = {(0 : Fin n → ℝ)} := h₇
    have h₉ : (Z ∩ (⊥ : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)) : Set (Fin n → ℝ)).ncard = 1 :=
      by
      rw [h₈]
      simp <;> aesop
    simp_all <;> aesop
  · have h₅ : 0 < k := Nat.pos_of_ne_zero hk0
    have h₆ : ∃ (V : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ)), Module.rank ℝ V = k ∧ (Z ∩ V).ncard = 2 ^ k :=
      by
      have h₇ : k ≤ n := hk
      have h₈ : n ≥ k := by linarith
      classical
      let V : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ) := ⨆ (i : Fin k), Submodule.span ℝ {(Pi.single (Fin.castLE hk i) 1 : Fin n → ℝ)}
      have h₉ : Module.rank ℝ V = k := by sorry
      have h₁₀ : (Z ∩ V : Set (Fin n → ℝ)).ncard = 2 ^ k := by sorry
      exact ⟨V, h₉, h₁₀⟩
    exact h₆
exact h₅

classical
let V : Submodule ℝ (Fin n → ℝ) := ⨆ (i : Fin k), Submodule.span ℝ {(Pi.single (Fin.castLE hk i) 1 : Fin n → ℝ)}
have h₉ : Module.rank ℝ V = k := by sorry
have h₁₀ : (Z ∩ V : Set (Fin n → ℝ)).ncard = 2 ^ k := by sorry
exact ⟨V, h₉, h₁₀⟩

obtain ⟨V, hV₁, hV₂⟩ := h₁
refine' ⟨V, _⟩
simp_all [hZ]
